```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
```


```{r}
bulls <- read_csv("Bull Riding/Bulls.csv")
```

# 1 Variable selection techniques

```{r}
bulls %>%
  select(-Bull) %>%
  cor() %>%
  round(2)
```

```{r}
bulls <- bulls %>%
  mutate(lessThree_Buckoff = ifelse(`Avg Buckoff Time` < 3.00, 1, 0),
         betterThanAverage = ifelse(`Avg BullScore` > mean(`Avg BullScore`), 1, 0) )
```


```{r}
bulls %>%
glm(`betterThanAverage` ~ `World Champ Avg Score` + `Avg Buckoff Time` + `Highest BullScore` + `45Pt Rides`, data = .) %>%
  summary()
```

```{r}
plot(glm(`betterThanAverage` ~ `World Champ Avg Score` + `Avg Buckoff Time` + `Highest BullScore` + `45Pt Rides`, data = bulls))
```
